Club Sandwich

Following these steps you will be able to prepare a delicious club sandwich in an easy way.

Preparation Time: 30(min)

Ingredients

  1. Bread (your choice)
  2. French fries
  3. ketchup
  4. mayonnaise
  5. mustard
  6. butter
  7. onion
  8. tomato
  9. cucumber
  10. lettuce
  11. yellow cheese
  12. cheddar cheese
  13. ham.

**Note: you can add as many ingredients as you want.

Instructions

Procedure for the sandwich

  • butter the bread
  • chop the onion, tomato and cucumber into thin slices (sauté if you don't like them raw)
  • place onion, tomato and cucumber on bread
  • spread ketchup, mayonnaise and mustard on the bread
  • put a slice of cheddar cheese, yellow cheese and ham on the bread
  • put a lettuce leaf on the bread
  • put the sandwich that has been made in a pan with low heat
  • Don't let the bread stick to the frying pan
  • Once the bread is a little browned, take it out of the pan.

Procedure for the potatoes

  • If you have bought frozen french fries, simply put them in a pan with oil over medium heat and let them brown before taking them out.
  • Once the potatoes are out, salt them to taste.

**Note:

  • If you have an air fryer, set it to 400°F and once they are toasted, take them out
  • If you have bought the potatoes in their original state, chop them into thin pieces and perform the same procedure as above.
